extendedInfo.description: A simple application developed to bring more fun in your life:   - If you're sad you'll become happy again   - If you're happy you'll become even happier   - You'll become the funniest guy of your friendsDownload now for free and without any AdsJust start the app, then tap on the bag and enjoyThe Laughing Bag has some really cool features:You can draw gestures to see some figures like a minion looking for a banana from despicable me. Also there are sheeps, cows, peter griffin and a sith lord. And all this you get for free in an application without any permissions and completly ad free.If you think this app is annoying just try to annoy your friends!If you like this app please rate it with 5 stars and follow us on Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/FabiUndJojoDevelopment
